biocontainers.name: piranha
biocontainers.summary: Piranha is a peak-caller for clip- and rip-seq data.

biotools.summary: Predicts the location of RNA binding residues in protein sequences using a support vector machine. Up to 10 protein sequences may be submitted.

bioschemas.name: PiRaNhA
bioschemas.summary: Predicts the location of RNA binding residues in protein sequences using a support vector machine. Up to 10 protein sequences may be submitted.
